name: integration
author: Prosopo

scripts.clean: find . -name "node_modules" -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name "build" -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' +
scripts.build: npm run build:contract && npm run build:provider && npm run build:procaptcha && npm run build:procaptcha-react
scripts.build:contract: npm run clean --workspace=@prosopo/contract && npm run build --workspace=@prosopo/contract
scripts.build:provider: npm run clean --workspace=@prosopo/provider && npm run build --workspace=@prosopo/provider
scripts.build:procaptcha: npm run clean --workspace=@prosopo/procaptcha && npm run build --workspace=@prosopo/procaptcha
scripts.build:procaptcha-react: npm run clean --workspace=@prosopo/procaptcha-react && npm run build --workspace=@prosopo/procaptcha-react
scripts.lint: yarn workspace @prosopo/provider run eslint --fix src && yarn workspace @prosopo/contract run eslint --fix src
scripts.git-sync: git submodule foreach -q --recursive 'git switch $(git config -f $toplevel/.gitmodules submodule.$name.branch || echo master)'

description: Integrates protocol and provider for development purposes
